propDefs.name: docker.image.name
propDefs.label: Docker Image Name
propDefs.description: Name of the Docker image to use with this component. i.e. tomcat, nginx, ubuntu

propDefs.name: docker.qualified.image
propDefs.label: Fully Qualified Docker Image
propDefs.description: Name to pass into pull command, in the form, [REGISTRY_HOST[:REGISTRY_PORT]/]NAME[:TAG]

propDefs.name: docker.registry
propDefs.label: Docker Registry
propDefs.description: Location of the docker registry used in pull commands

propDefs.name: docker.container.name
propDefs.label: Container Name
propDefs.description: Name to assign to the running docker container

processes.name: Update Inventory
processes.description: Empty process to help acquire component versions during a docker-compose up deployment.

componentTemplate.name: ArgoCD Template
componentTemplate.description: Component template for use with ArgoCD deployments

propDefs.name: argocd.server
propDefs.label: argocd.server
propDefs.description: The name or IP address of the Argo CD server to login to.

propDefs.name: argocd.user
propDefs.label: argocd.user
propDefs.description: The username of an account to authenticate.

propDefs.name: argocd.password
propDefs.label: argocd.password
propDefs.description: The password of an account to authenticate.

propDefs.name: argocd.application.name
propDefs.label: argocd.application.name
propDefs.description: The name of the Argo CD application.

propDefs.name: argocd.global.flags
propDefs.label: argocd.global.flags
propDefs.description: Global flags that should be applied to all commands, such as --config=../argocd.config

propDefs.name: argocd.cmd.path
propDefs.label: argocd.cmd.path
propDefs.description: The name of the argocd command if it is in the system path or the full path to run the argocd command.
